abstract: Berkshire Hathaway, the investment company controlled by Warren E. Buffett, took advantage of prices driven down by the credit crisis and the slowing American economy.
snippet: Berkshire Hathaway, the investment company controlled by Warren E. Buffett, took advantage of prices driven down by the credit crisis and the slowing American economy.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway, the investment company controlled by Warren E. Buffett, added to stakes in Kraft Foods and Wells Fargo in the first quarter, taking advantage of prices driven down by the credit crisis and the slowing American economy.

headline.main: Buffett Increases Stakes in Kraft Foods and Wells Fargo
headline.print_headline: Buffett Increases Stakes in Kraft Foods and Wells Fargo
